p: Ta. Annual cumulative number of dengue cases at the country level between 2009 and 2016. The response variable was log ( nÂ° of cases), modeled in a GLM with Gaussian error distribution (link identity) as a function of climatic variables and dengue cases in bordering countries ( Table 1). This period presents the best quality in surveillance data. Before the 2009 epidemics, records had lower standards.
